skills.skill: Data Migration Life Cycle Implementation
SAP Data Services + SAP Information Steward tools expertise
DATA Quality + Governance Process
Syniti Advance Data Management
Data Intelligence HANA / HANA Data Services Project experience
Lead customers engagements for full data lifecycle requirement
Provide customers best practices for data conversion into SAP and data management
Engage in leading engagements for business data inside and outside SAP solution
Building, maintaining, and driving the schedule of Data Value stream activities
Leadership and oversight of Data Value stream team
Engagement with Project Team Leads for IT architecture to enable Data Quality reporting and business processes
Cross-functional master, functional, and transactional data design related to Advanced Planning capabilities
Tracking project deliverables and providing status reports
Tracking risks, assumptions, issues, and dependencies to the project
Ability to lead a team of data experts and work with Functional team and legacy experts
Training and transferring knowledge to the team members
Administering ERP in production environment
Managing database optimization, back-up, and recovery
Monitoring new software releases, support packs, and kernel upgrades
Troubleshooting at the ERP and database level

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the implementation of data migration life cycle and SAP data services using expertise in DATA quality and governance processes.
Engage in customer interactions to understand data lifecycle requirements and provide best practices for data conversion into SAP.
Manage, maintain, and drive the schedule of Data Value stream activities, ensuring alignment with the overall project plan and timeline.
Provide leadership and oversight to the Data Value stream team, engaging with Project Team Leads in coordinating IT architecture for Data Quality reporting and business processes.
Design cross-functional master, functional, and transactional data related to Advanced Planning capabilities, ensuring data accuracy and consistency.
Track project deliverables, risks, assumptions, issues, and dependencies, and provide accurate status reports to project stakeholders.
Lead a team of data experts, work with the Functional team and legacy experts, and transfer knowledge to team members.
Administer ERP in a production environment, manage database optimization, back-up, recovery, and monitor the occurrence of new software releases and upgrades.
Perform troubleshooting at the ERP and database levels to ensure smooth operation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred) with relevant certifications in SAP Data Management and related tools.
